description: The Translated skill gives Alexa the skill to translate sentences from English to more than 100 languages and to pronounce correctly. Brought to you by Translated.net, fast and easy professional translation services.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Translated how do you say how are you in Chinese
Alexa ask Translated to say it's a wonderful day in Thai
name: Translated
shortDescription: Translate in more than 100 languages and listen to the translation with the correct pronunciation
